title: A single-level container for SCM repositories under Procession's control.

name.description: Name for the domain (used in determining the user's 'slug' value).

slug.description: Lowercased, hyphenated non-UUID identififer used in URIs.

created_on.description: The date-time when the organization was created, in ISO 8601 format.

owner_id.description: Identifier for the user who owns the domain.
